This game took the concept of asymmetrical multiplayer gaming and ran with it. I love this game. If you are looking for something to fill the void that Evolve and Evolve Stage 2 left this is the game for you. You play as either one of four survivors attempting to escape a nightmarish map where a killer is lurking to sacrifice you to an unknown entity that brought you all together. I would say this game is the definitive game for asymmetrical multiplayer and it only gets better with each and every "Chapter" they release giving us new maps and characters to play as. You owe it to yourself to give this game a chance. If you have 4 other friends you game with and are looking for something new to try give it a go.

Just wrote yes initially but after awhile decided to change it. Rank 4 killer, survivors are so perk heavy and unless you use a meta killer or have the best perks on a killer by saving up bloodpoints playing as a meta killer, you can basically accept the fact that you'll lose every game. As a survivor, good luck ranking up. at the beginning it seems like everyone plays for themselves and is too scared to do anything, while the killers focus one person so hard that taking one for the team just results in you being killed while the others escape, losing your items. Getting bloodpoints as a survivor already feels like an ultra grind. This game has some polish and balancing issues, and i really hope they get them figured out and cleaned up before another competitor comes along and does the asymmetric horror formula better than BHVR. Only recommending because its the only game of its kind, and the only freaking silent hill content I've seen in almost a decade

Very fun with friends and noobs, but very unfun solo once you rank up and begin encountering try-hards. Certain mechanics give killers a disproportionate advantage (exposed, undetectable).

If you insist on buying this game, I recommend:
a) be a try-hard
b) play with friends only
[strike]c) don't go past rank 14 and wait for the monthly reset[/strike] (Ranking system has changed)

------Revision------

Other things to keep in mind:

1. Survivor queues can be upwards of 5 minutes in the evenings. Combine this with a bad match and it makes for a very frustrating experience.
[strike]2. Each survivor and killer have their own perks that be unlocked for use with other characters. Some very strong perks belong to characters that are DLC only (extra $$).[/strike] (This is addressed by the Shrine of Secrets)

Very fun asymmetric game that is decent on its own and a blast to play with friends. The only major downside is that it feels very pay-to-win, as most of the content is locked behind dozens of expensive DLC packs, and the few you can purchase with in-game currency will take hundreds of games to earn a single new character containing unique perks. Definitely makes Behavior Interactive comes off as a greedy company. Charge for cosmetic changes, not game-altering content.

Эта игра перевернула мою жизнь! Тысячи гневных комментов на моей странице оставленные прогнившими до мозга костей обитателей этого заповедника, из-за чего у меня обострилась депрессия, после каждой катки я желал всем удачи, но у этих тварей нет понятия что есть добро С̸̧̙͇͈̜̘̘̫̦̗͈̳̈́̾͗̋̎̃̍Д̴̡̙̔͛̓͂̈́̐̂͋̽́̕̕͝ͅО̵̢̡̫̤̩͕̼̜̩̞̜̖́̽̓̌̍̀̾͝Х̷̠̭͚̗͓͐Н̷͕͇͛͗͒̔͋̓̅͘Ӥ̸̡̛̻̘͕͖͓̟́͋͊̄̃͆̆̅̚͜ ̵̨̻̹̱̻͖̘̼͖͆̉́͝П̷̧͓̫̯̲̠̏̌̽͘О̴̺̱̻̺͖̹̲̭̤̹͈͆̿̾М̶̤̠̘̟͉̻̤̬̦͙̣̈̏̋͝Р̵̡̡͈̠͓̜́͌͋̃̏̐̾И̴͔͙̠̲̋ ̷͇̜͚̬̍̕Ч̷̨̠̜̭̀̉͜͝Т̸͇͕͉̰͓̝̃͊̊͛̾̋͊́̌̑͋О̴̢̤͈̲̙̌̈́̈́͋̈̒̈̈́̕Б̷̢̠̬̟̜͓͍̤̮̈̿͂̓͛ͅ ̶̢͖̻̘͚͒̐̚͝͠Т̷̨͉͚͖͙̞̜͖̤̦̋̃̊̔̐͆͂͊͊͛́̕̕Е̷̡͓͈̟̰̤͓̘̘̦̖͕͖͛̂́̈͘Б̵̹̲͈͚̣͋̓Я̶̛͕͚̙̯͓͇͉̻̋̔͋̒̈́̃̋̉̅͋̕͝ ̴̢͚͚͈͚̟̮͚̦̓̓̄̍̾͘̕͝И̷̫̤̮̲̖͖̟͊͒͌̈́͑̈́̆͆́З̷̨͉͖͂У̴̨̻̗̙̖͐Р̷̧̛̭͈̟͎̬͙̜̉̅̓̎̔О̷͚̣̍͐̑͑̽͛͗́̕ͅД̸̧̲͍̜͙̟̗̳͇̯͠Ӧ̸̳̻̭͚̭͈͚̤̹В̶͍̰͇͎̮͈̼̣̈͛̂̿̀͛͑͐̈́͘͝А̴̨͕̯͖̜̝͛̔̋͝Л̸̡̢̢͓̘͉͙̼͕̪̠͈̻͠И̶̡̨̢̮̼̯̥͈͚̼͙̲͂͜ ̷̪̺̘͐̾̌̓̈͜͜Н̷̛̮̬͇̘̰̤͔̩̝̫͍̲͙͊̈́̕А̷̨͔̯͂̈́͝Х̶̢̛͙̙̳͎̫͐͛̃̀̈́̎͆̍̋̑͛͝У̸̥̫̹̗̭̠͕̊̿̊̉͑Й̴̢̢̢͎͔̤͕̘̘͓̥͆̈́̐̾̆͂̓ͅ .
 По началу я это всерьёз не воспринимал мол "подумаешь, в каждой каждой игре есть токсики" но эта игра исключение. Я не мог этого вынести мою голову начинали лезть плохие мысли. 
с̸̧̹̤͊̿е̸̧̤͚͂͋͆р̸̗̮̚ь̴̻̰̏̄ё̵̜̹̰͊́з̶͇̗̰͐н̷̱͕̈́͛о̴̢̉̅ ̶̦͙̀̽п̴̺̰̹̒͘о̸͎͍̒ч̵̼͚̫̉ё̶̦͠м̵̳͉͓̏͘у̶͈̮̓̑ ̴͓͎̽т̸̭͖̩͂̂̚ы̴̟̰̭̅͛ ̶̟̞̘̾̄й̵͚͙̱х̶̬̭̍͒͂ ̴͖͐̈́т̸̨̮̚е̴̩̹̓р̸̘̲̑п̴͕̐и̷̛̻̖͎ш̴̪̰̾̆͌ь̴̗̱̓ ̶̘̪̖̆͐п̶̠̉̿р̷̺̙͇͘о̵̬͝с̸͔̭̣̑̉̅т̵͓͛о̵̯̝̬̊͘ ̵̡̼̏ӱ̸̥̝͔́б̸̫̭̮̋͠е̵͉͛̈́й̵̬͚͌с̵̢̨̨̂я̷̣͕̌͑͜. Я больше не мог терпеть эту жизнь, поэтому я решил покинуть её, но перед этим зайдя в игру и посмотреть в последний раз на них. Но вдруг я услышал знакомую фразу "С̸̳̈́М̷̹̉Е̵̖̂Р̴͗͜Т̸̲̄Ь̵̞͗ ̸̯̉Э̶͙̊Т̵̪́О̵̹̓ ̶̛͖Н̸̫͑Е̴̲́ ̶̜̏В̶̦͋Ы̷͕̀Х̸̨͝О̶̟͝Д̷͖͛ ".
